# User Story Template

Copy this template when creating new user stories.

---

## [STORY-ID] [Feature Name]

**Priority**: P2 (Medium)
**Effort**: M
**Status**: Draft

### User Story

**As a** [user persona]
**I want** [goal]
**So that** [benefit]

### Context

[Why this matters, related features, background]

### Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] **AC1**: Given [precondition], when [action], then [result]
- [ ] **AC2**: Given [precondition], when [action], then [result]
- [ ] **AC3**: Given [precondition], when [action], then [result]

### Edge Cases

| Scenario    | Expected Behavior      |
| ----------- | ---------------------- |
| Empty state | Show onboarding prompt |
| Error state | Display retry option   |
| Offline     | Use cached data        |

### Out of Scope

- Item explicitly not included
- Another excluded item

### Dependencies

- [ ] Required feature/component
- [ ] API or data requirement

### Success Metrics

| Metric      | Target       | How to Measure  |
| ----------- | ------------ | --------------- |
| Adoption    | 80% of users | Analytics event |
| Performance | < 2s load    | Lighthouse      |

### Open Questions

- [ ] Unresolved question?
